Parameters:
Name Type Description

up_only Boolean Disable upside-down camera view
Source:
  • ext/util.js, line 207

(static) euler_to_quat(euler)

Convert euler rotation to quaternion rotation.

The euler angles have the following meaning:

  • euler[0]: heading, y
  • euler[1]: attitude, z
  • euler[2]: bank, x

Using euler angles is discouraged, use quaternion instead.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
euler Float32Array Euler vector
Source:
  • ext/util.js, line 66

(static) ground_project_quat()

Project camera quaternion rotation on a horizontal plane.
Deprecated:
  • Bad implementation use quat_project instead

    (static) quat_to_euler(quat)

    Convert quaternion rotation to euler rotation.

    The euler angles have the following meaning:

    • euler[0]: heading, y
    • euler[1]: attitude, z
    • euler[2]: bank, x

    Using euler angles is discouraged, use quaternion instead.

    Parameters:
    Name Type Description
    quat Float32Array Quaternion vector
    Source:
    • ext/util.js, line 84
